description.zh-cn: 台湾政坛中与中国国民党意识型态相近的各种团体之总称，其主要政治对手为泛绿。
description.en: A general term for various groups in Taiwanese politics that are ideologically aligned with the Kuomintang. Its main political rival is the Pan-Green Coalition.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的主要政党之一，为泛蓝阵营的核心。
description.en: One of the major political parties in Taiwan, the core of the Pan-Blue Coalition.

description.zh-cn: 由宋楚瑜在2000年总统选举后成立的政党，是泛蓝阵营的创始成员之一。
description.en: A political party founded by James Soong after the 2000 presidential election, and one of the founding members of the Pan-Blue Coalition.

description.zh-cn: 由新国民党连线成员于1994年脱离国民党后成立的政党，是泛蓝阵营的成员。
description.en: A political party founded in 1994 by members of the New Kuomintang Alliance after they split from the Kuomintang. It is a member of the Pan-Blue Coalition.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一个左翼政党，属于泛蓝阵营。
description.en: A left-wing political party in Taiwan, belonging to the Pan-Blue Coalition.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一个政党，属于泛蓝阵营。
description.en: A political party in Taiwan, belonging to the Pan-Blue Coalition.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一个政党，属于泛蓝阵营。
description.en: A political party in Taiwan, belonging to the Pan-Blue Coalition.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一个政党，属于泛蓝阵营。
description.en: A political party in Taiwan, belonging to the Pan-Blue Coalition.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，新党元老，最早发明“泛蓝”一词。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, a veteran of the New Party, credited with coining the term 'Pan-Blue'.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，原属新党，在媒体上大力宣传“泛蓝”一词使其普及。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, formerly of the New Party, who popularized the term 'Pan-Blue' in the media.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国历史上首次政党轮替的总统选举，选举后“泛蓝”一词开始出现。
description.en: The presidential election that resulted in the first-ever transfer of power between political parties in the Republic of China. The term 'Pan-Blue' emerged after this election.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任台湾省长。在2000年脱离国民党后成立并担任亲民党主席。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former Governor of Taiwan Province. After leaving the Kuomintang in 2000, he founded and has since chaired the People First Party.

description.zh-cn: 原为中国国民党内的次级团体，后脱离国民党并成立新党。
description.en: Originally a sub-group within the Kuomintang, it later split off to form the New Party.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中华民国副总统、中国国民党主席。
description.en: Taiwanese politician who served as Vice President of the Republic of China and Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中华民国总统及中国国民党主席。其执政后期政策与国民党非主流派产生分歧。
description.en: Taiwanese politician who served as President of the Republic of China and Chairman of the Kuomintang. His policies in his later term caused a split with the non-mainstream faction of the KMT.

description.zh-cn: 由中国国民党与亲民党在2003年组成的政治联盟，共同竞选2004年总统大选。
description.en: A political alliance formed in 2003 by the Kuomintang and the People First Party to jointly contest the 2004 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中华民国总统及中国国民党主席。
description.en: Taiwanese politician who served as President of the Republic of China and Chairman of the Kuomintang.

nodes.id: 2014年中华民国地方公职人员选举

zh-cn: 2014年中华民国地方公职人员选举

description.zh-cn: 一次地方公职人员选举，国民党的败选导致时任党主席马英九辞职。
description.en: A local election in which the Kuomintang's defeat led to the resignation of then-party chairman Ma Ying-jeou.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，原为国民党中常委，后脱党创立民国党。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former KMT Central Standing Committee member, who later left the party to found the Minkuotang.

description.zh-cn: 由徐欣莹于2015年创立的政党，后于2019年并入国会政党联盟。
description.en: A political party founded by Hsu Hsin-ying in 2015, which later merged into the Congress Party Alliance in 2019.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一个已解散政党，民国党曾于2019年并入该党。
description.en: A defunct political party in Taiwan, which the Minkuotang merged into in 2019.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政坛中与民主进步党意识型态相近的各种团体之总称，为泛蓝的主要政治对手。
description.en: A general term for various groups in Taiwanese politics that are ideologically aligned with the Democratic Progressive Party. It is the main political rival of the Pan-Blue Coalition.

description.zh-cn: 由时任中华民国总统李登辉于1999年提出的两岸关系论述。
description.en: A theory on cross-strait relations proposed in 1999 by then-President of the Republic of China, Lee Teng-hui.

description.zh-cn: 2005年，包含国民党主席连战、亲民党主席宋楚瑜、新党主席郁慕明在内的泛蓝领袖陆续访问中国大陆，此后泛蓝大幅降低反共色彩。
description.en: In 2005, Pan-Blue leaders including KMT Chairman Lien Chan, PFP Chairman James Soong, and New Party Chairman Yok Mu-ming visited mainland China in succession. Afterward, the Pan-Blue Coalition significantly reduced its anti-communist rhetoric.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，新党创党人之一，曾任新党主席。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, one of the founders of the New Party and its former chairman.

description.zh-cn: 由柯文哲于2019年创立的台湾政党。在2023年曾与国民党商谈“蓝白合”共同竞选总统，但最终破局。
description.en: A Taiwanese political party founded by Ko Wen-je in 2019. It negotiated with the KMT in 2023 for a 'Blue-White Coalition' joint presidential ticket, which ultimately failed.

description.zh-cn: 指2024年总统大选前，中国国民党（蓝）与台湾民众党（白）之间的政治结盟协商。该协商最终于2023年11月破局。
description.en: Refers to the political alliance negotiations between the Kuomintang (Blue) and the Taiwan People's Party (White) before the 2024 presidential election. The negotiations ultimately collapsed in November 2023.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，中国国民党籍，代表该党参选2024年中华民国总统选举。
description.en: Taiwanese politician of the Kuomintang, who represented the party in the 2024 ROC presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，台湾民众党创党人及现任党主席，代表该党参选2024年中华民国总统选举。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, founder and current chairman of the Taiwan People's Party, who represented the party in the 2024 ROC presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党是泛蓝阵营的核心政党。
description.en: The Kuomintang is the core party of the Pan-Blue Coalition.

description.zh-cn: 亲民党是泛蓝阵营的成员党之一。
description.en: The People First Party is one of the member parties of the Pan-Blue Coalition.

description.zh-cn: 新党是泛蓝阵营的成员党之一。
description.en: The New Party is one of the member parties of the Pan-Blue Coalition.

description.zh-cn: 泛蓝的主要竞争对手为泛绿。
description.en: The main competitor of the Pan-Blue Coalition is the Pan-Green Coalition.

description.zh-cn: 发明了“泛蓝”这一名词。
description.en: Coined the term 'Pan-Blue'.

description.zh-cn: 在媒体上大力宣传“泛蓝”一词，使其广为接受使用。
description.en: Strongly promoted the term 'Pan-Blue' in the media, leading to its widespread acceptance and use.

description.zh-cn: 该次选举后，台湾政坛开始使用“泛蓝”一词来指代国民党及其意识形态相近的盟友。
description.en: After this election, the term 'Pan-Blue' began to be used in Taiwanese politics to refer to the KMT and its ideologically similar allies.

description.zh-cn: 原为中国国民党内的次级团体，后于1994年脱离国民党。
description.en: Originally a sub-group within the Kuomintang, it split from the party in 1994.

description.zh-cn: 新国民党连线脱离国民党后，成立了新党。
description.en: After splitting from the Kuomintang, the New Kuomintang Alliance founded the New Party.

description.zh-cn: 在2000年总统选举后，脱离国民党成立亲民党。
description.en: After the 2000 presidential election, he left the Kuomintang and founded the People First Party.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国地方公职人员选举

description.zh-cn: 因国民党在此次选举中败选，马英九辞去党主席一职。
description.en: Due to the KMT's defeat in this election, Ma Ying-jeou resigned as party chairman.

description.zh-cn: 于2015年宣布脱离国民党并建立民国党。
description.en: Announced her departure from the KMT and established the Minkuotang in 2015.

description.zh-cn: 民国党于2019年并入国会政党联盟。
description.en: The Minkuotang merged into the Congress Party Alliance in 2019.

description.zh-cn: 于1999年推出特殊两国论，中断两岸的政治谈判。
description.en: Introduced the 'Special state-to-state relations' theory in 1999, which suspended cross-strait political negotiations.

description.zh-cn: 此次及后续泛蓝领袖对中国大陆的访问，使得泛蓝阵营大幅降低反共色彩，并转而主张两岸关系和平发展。
description.en: This and subsequent visits by Pan-Blue leaders to mainland China led the coalition to significantly tone down its anti-communist stance and instead advocate for peaceful development of cross-strait relations.

description.zh-cn: 作为时任国民党主席访问中国大陆。
description.en: Visited mainland China as the then-chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 作为亲民党主席，是2005年陆续访问中国大陆的泛蓝领袖之一。
description.en: As chairman of the People First Party, he was one of the Pan-Blue leaders who visited mainland China in 2005.

description.zh-cn: 作为新党主席，是2005年陆续访问中国大陆的泛蓝领袖之一。
description.en: As chairman of the New Party, he was one of the Pan-Blue leaders who visited mainland China in 2005.

description.zh-cn: 与台湾民众党进行总统选举整合协商，但最终破局。
description.en: Engaged in negotiations with the Taiwan People's Party for a joint presidential ticket, but the talks ultimately failed.

description.zh-cn: 与中国国民党进行总统选举整合协商，但最终破局。
description.en: Engaged in negotiations with the Kuomintang for a joint presidential ticket, but the talks ultimately failed.

description.zh-cn: 为进行“蓝白合”总统选举整合进行谈判，但最终破局。
description.en: Met to negotiate a 'Blue-White Coalition' for a joint presidential ticket, but the talks ultimately failed.
